title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Aug 11 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Aug 11 2021
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3: Senator Josh Hawley (R-MO) joins Clay and Buck to talk about the $3.5 trillion boondoggle infrastructure spending disaster. The bill is a woke wish list for the left. Biden administration is hiding illegal immigration numbers. Democrats want pandemic forever. Trump weighs in on the communist plan to destroy America. What can the Republicans do to stop this liberal spending spree? Pain at the gas pump? You can thank Biden. Clay and Buck discover they are station wagon brothers.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
